results.title: Myocardial bridging:an unusual cause of Wellens syndrome
results.text_hl: ...Coronary @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ is usually @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ in etiology and has various electrocardiographic presentations.

results.title: Chest pain and Raynaud's phenomenon after COVID-19 vaccination in a patient previously diagnosed with systemic lupus erythematosus: a case report
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@Chest pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Raynaud_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D011928 @@@Raynaud's phenomenon@@@ after @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ vaccination in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ previously diagnosed with @DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@systemic lupus erythematosus@@@: a case report

citations.NLM: Kawano H, Umeda M, Okano S, Kudo T. Chest pain and Raynaud's phenomenon after COVID-19 vaccination in a patient previously diagnosed with systemic lupus erythematosus: a case report Eur Heart J Case Rep. 2023 Mar;7(3):ytad102. PMID: 36909840

results.title: Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report.
results.text_hl: He was discharged on @CHEMICAL_isosorbide_5_mononitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C030397 @@@isosorbide mononitrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ therapy and had no recurrence of symptoms during follow-up.

citations.NLM: Wang A, Meir J, Malik A, Fishkin T, Dey S, Panza JA, Haidry S. Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report. Future Cardiol. 2024 Sep 4;():1-6. PMID: 39229652

results.title: The role of computed tomography coronary angiography in multi-vessel coronary vasospasm: a case report
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ was associated with diaphoresis and resolved spontaneously.

results.title: Rare Clinical Manifestation of Vasculitis.
results.text_hl: Five hours after presentation, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ repeated @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@, accompanied by a @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@drop in blood pressure@@@ and junctional escape rhythm.

results.text_hl: A 77-Year-Old @SPECIES_9606 @@@Woman@@@ With Acute @DISEASE_Dyspnea @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Shortness of Breath@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@Chest Pain@@@.

results.title: Value of the addition of amlodipine to atenolol in patients with angina pectoris despite adequate beta blockade.
results.text_hl: The subgroup of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with an early (<6 minutes) onset of @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ at baseline showed a significant increase in time to @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ after @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (p = 0.0001 vs controls).

citations.NLM: Dunselman PH, van Kempen LH, Bouwens LH, Holwerda KJ, Herweijer AH, Bernink PJ. Value of the addition of amlodipine to atenolol in patients with angina pectoris despite adequate beta blockade. Am J Cardiol. 1998 Jan 15;81(2):128-32. PMID: 9591892
citations.BibTeX: @article{9591892, title={Value of the addition of amlodipine to atenolol in patients with angina pectoris despite adequate beta blockade.}, author={Dunselman PH and van Kempen LH and Bouwens LH and Holwerda KJ and Herweijer AH and Bernink PJ}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={81}, number={2}, pages={128-32}}

results.title: A comparative study of once-daily amlodipine versus twice-daily diltiazem controlled release (CR) in the treatment of stable angina pectoris. Amlodipine Study Group.
results.text_hl: The median time to 1 mm ST-segment @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ and time to onset of @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ were increased by 16% (P < 0.0001) and 13% (P < 0.0001) with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and by 16% (P < 0.0001) and 7% (P = 0.009) with @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ CR, respectively.

citations.NLM: van Kesteren HA, Withagen AJ. A comparative study of once-daily amlodipine versus twice-daily diltiazem controlled release (CR) in the treatment of stable angina pectoris. Amlodipine Study Group. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 1998 Oct;12 Suppl 3():233-7. PMID: 9800052
citations.BibTeX: @article{9800052, title={A comparative study of once-daily amlodipine versus twice-daily diltiazem controlled release (CR) in the treatment of stable angina pectoris. Amlodipine Study Group.}, author={van Kesteren HA and Withagen AJ}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={12 Suppl 3}, pages={233-7}}

results.title: A Case of Coronary Vasospasm after Repeat Rituximab Infusion
results.text_hl: She was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and her @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ did not recur during the admission.

citations.NLM: Ke C, Khosla A, Davis MK, Hague C, Toma M. A Case of Coronary Vasospasm after Repeat Rituximab Infusion Case Rep Cardiol. 2015;2015():523149. PMID: 25866684
